colourTooltip: Changes the color of the pen.
jumpTooltip: Moves the turtle without leaving any marks.
moveTooltip: Moves the turtle forward or backward by the specified amount.
notBlackColour: You need to set a color other than black for this level.
numBlocksNeeded: This level can be solved with %1 blocks.  You used %2.
penTooltip: Lifts or lowers the pen, to start or stop drawing.
title: CS First: Turtle Graphics %1
tooFewColours: You need to use at least %1 different colors on this level.  You used only %2.
turnRightTooltip: Turns the turtle right by the specified angle.
turnTooltip: Turns the turtle left or right by the specified number of degrees.
turtleVisibilityTooltip: Makes the turtle (green circle and arrow) visible or invisible.
widthTooltip: Changes the width of the pen.
wrongColour: Your picture is the wrong color.  For this level, it needs to be %1.
